title: 如何给一个权限组创造权限
author: chizzb
txt_content: 如何给一个权限组创造权限？？？

replies.author: AD【钙奶】
replies.txt_content:
chizzb 发表于 2016-12-21 18:39
请问有没有这些基础权限的一个表qwq就是类似的还有飞行啊之类的权限，都叫啥？ ...
飞行：essentials.fly
强制TP：essentials.tp
随身末影箱：essentials.enderchest 随身工作台：essentials.workbench

replies.author: lovechina
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp default essentials.creative
取消权限的话就
/mangaddp default -essentials.creative

replies.author: chizzb
replies.txt_content:
lovechina 发表于 2016-12-21 18:38
/mangaddp default essentials.creative
取消权限的话就
/mangaddp default -essentials.creative
请问有没有这些基础权限的一个表qwq就是类似的还有飞行啊之类的权限，都叫啥？

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
来晚了...
